it.uniroma1.lcl.mynn

Class UfSingleLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.lcl.mynn.UfSingleLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpgradeFunction

    public class UfSingleLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUpgradeFunction
    Upgrading weights algorithm for a generic single layer neural network. The algorithm is explained into MyNN documentation.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nunzio Castelli

      double[] upgrade(java.util.LinkedList<Layer> layers, int i, double[] input, double[] output, double lr)
      Update the weights of the neurons into the current layer in according to the generic single layer algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • upgrade

        public double[] upgrade(java.util.LinkedList<Layer> layers,
                        int i,
                        double[] input,
                        double[] output,
                        double lr)
                 throws UpgradeFunctionException
        Update the weights of the neurons into the current layer in according to the generic single layer algorithm. On error an exception will be raised.
        Specified by:
        upgrade in interface IUpgradeFunction
        Parameters:
        layers - the network layers.
        i - current working layer.
        input - inputs for the current layer.
        output - the expected output for the current layer.
        lr - the learning rate constant.
        Returns:
        null reserved for future use
        Throws:
        UpgradeFunctionException
